title: Who is new to the cast of The Walking Dead season 10?
text:
The Walking Dead has a few new faces this season (Picture: AMC)

The Walking Dead is proving as tense as ever as the tenth season of the show hits its stride.

Following the tense ending of season 9, the new series got underway last week in the US and UK with an intense opening episode which paved the way for more drama to come.

And as well as returning cast members including Norman Reedus, Danai Gurira and Samantha Morton, the show’s playing host to a few new cast members this year, including a scary new addition to the Whisperers.

Just who is new to the cast and where have you seen them before?

Here’s what you need to know…

Who is new to the cast of The Walking Dead season 10?

Here’s who is new to the cast of the show this year…

Thora Birch

Thora Birch is among the newcomers this year in a super-creepy role (Picture: AMC)

Who does she play? Gamma, a creepy new addition to the Whisperers and a loyal follower of their leader Alpha (Morton).

Advertisement

Advertisement

Where have you seen her before? Former child star Thora has a huge string of credits to her name – as a child actress she appeared in the likes of All I Want For Christmas, Patriot Games, Hocus Pocus, Monkey Trouble and Now and Then. However you probably also remember her as troubled teen Jane Burnham in American Beauty as well as Enid in the comic book adaptation Ghost World.

Kevin Carroll

Kevin Carroll plays Virgil who is on the hunt for his family (Picture: AMC)

Who does he play? Virgil, described as ‘highly intelligent and resourceful and desperately trying to get home to his family’.

Where have you seen him before? Carroll’s previous credits include The Leftovers, The Catch, Sacred Lies and Snowfall – while he also recently showed up in the Netflix movie Velvet Buzzsaw. On the big screen he’s had small roles in Being John Malkovich and The Object Of My Affection.

Paola Lazaro

Paola Lazaro joins the cast as Princess (Picture: FilmMagic)

Who does she play? Princess – aka Juanita Sanchez – whose arrival suggests a major storyline from the comic books could be about to come into play.

Where have you see her before? Away from The Walking Dead, the actress is best known for the TV series Lethal Weapon, in which she plays Gutierrez.

The Walking Dead continues next Monday on Fox at 9pm.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: The Walking Dead is back on our screens for season 10 - but who is new to the cast this time?
